column5: Does anyone have any information about the water conditions at Ear Falls? Being it is a flowage system, the lake is at the mercy of draw down and then the snow and rain fall in winter and spring. Also, sometimes they direct the over flow from Lake St Josephs into Lac Seul.Thanks for any info. Heading up there this Friday.
Try these sitesWater flow datahttp://www.lwcb.ca/waterflowdata.htmlRed Lake weather infohttp://www.ontarioweather.com/foreca...y=Red+Lake+YRL
